title: Loyalty Tier Downgraded
description: Fires when a user is downgraded to a lower loyalty tier.

programId.description: The unique identifier of the loyalty program.

previousTier.description: The tier the user was in before the downgrade.

newTier.description: The tier the user was downgraded to.

memberId.description: The unique identifier of the loyalty member.

reason.description: The reason for the tier downgrade.
